welcome: Welcome to my personal webpage.You can find a list of all my friends and the different people I've met during my adventures, all my films and, of course, all my victims with all the info you need. And before you leave this section I want to apologize because this website is not totally responsive yet. We are working in it. Enjoy your visit!
